data.name: MSPOSDToolTip
data.value:
Upload the latest MSPOSD of OpenIPC Upload the fonts for Betaflight to the OpenIPC camera
To enter the menu move: LEFT stick to bottom right and RIGHT stick to bottom left
MSPVTX is partially working, do NOT use

data.name: IPToolTip
data.value: Type the OpenIPC Camera IP/NVR/Radxa Zero 3w(WFB-ng) in a correct format XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX

data.name: RestartWfbToolTip
data.value: Restart the WFB on the OpenIPC camera

data.name: RestartMajesticToolTip
data.value: Restarts the Majestic on the OpenIPC camera

data.name: ScriptFilesBackupToolTip
data.value: Transfer all the *.sh files from /root/ and /usr/sbin/channels.sh of the OpenIPC camera to the location of the OpenIPC Configurator executable

data.name: RecOffToolTip
data.value: Turn OFF the onboard REC

data.name: RecOnToolTip
data.value: Turn ON the onboard REC

data.name: OnBoardRecToolTip
data.value: Turns ON or OFF the Onboard Recording. Must select ON or OFF option first

data.name: UploadINavFontsToolTip
data.value: Upload the fonts for INAV to the OpenIPC camera

data.name: AddMavlinkExtraToolTip
data.value: 1) Add OSD SOC temperature 2) Set low delay for the channels.sh switches

data.name: DisableUART0ToolTip
data.value: Disable UART0 serial port. Must also be selected to the Serial Selector

data.name: EnableUART0ToolTip
data.value: Enable UART0 serial port. Must also be selected to the Serial Selector

data.name: ResetCameraToolTip
data.value: Reset OpenIPC camera settings to factory defaults

data.name: SensorBinBackupToolTip
data.value: Transfer the imx415_fpv.bin from the the Sigmastar OpenIPC camera to the backup folder in the location of the OpenIPC Configurator.exe file

data.name: SensorDriverBackupToolTip
data.value: Transfer the sensor_imx415_mipi.ko from the the Sigmastar OpenIPC camera to the backup folder in the location of the OpenIPC Configurator executable file

data.name: SensorDriverUpdateToolTip
data.value: Transfer the sensor_imx415_mipi.ko from the location of the OpenIPC Configurator.exe file to the Sigmastar OpenIPC camera

data.name: SensorBinUpdateToolTip
data.value: 1.Select a sensor calibration file from the list 2.Click Sensor Bin Update 3.Reboot

data.name: ScriptFilesRestoreToolTip
data.value: Transfer all the *.sh files from the location of the OpenIPC Configurator executable to /root/ and /usr/sbin/channels.sh" of the OpenIPC camera"

data.name: RecvDroneKeyToolTip
data.value: Receive drone.key from the designated IP

data.name: ScanIpToolTip
data.value: 1. Type the IP subnet to scan (eg. 192.168.0.) 2. Press [SCAN]" 3. Wait for the [Scan completed] message to appear Do not touch anything until finished

data.name: SendDroneKeyToolTip
data.value: Send the encrypted key to the designated IP

data.name: StepsTextBox
data.value: Step 1: Select which VRX to use Step 2: Enter the VRX Step 3: Click [Generate keys] Step 4: Click [Receive drone.key] Step 5: Reboot the VRX Step 6: Select the option [OpenIPC Camera] Step 7: Enter the OpenIPC camera IP Step 8: Click [Send drone.key] Step 9: Reboot OpenIPC camera

data.name: btnVRXMSPDisplayPort
data.value: Enables the MSP Displayport function of OpenIPC

data.name: btnVRXMajestic
data.value: Enables Mavlink Telemetry function of OpenIPC

data.name: GenerateKeysToolTip
data.value: Generate Keys

data.name: SendGsKeyToolTip
data.value: Send the encrypted key to the designated IP

data.name: RecvGsKeyToolTip
data.value: Receive gs.key from the designated IP

data.name: btnSaveAndRestartWfbText
data.value: Save & Restart WFB

data.name: FpvEnabledToolTip
data.value: Enables 3A algorithm with less cpu load and enables FPV section for other functions below.

data.name: FpvNoiseLevelToolTip
data.value: FPV Noise Level

data.name: FpvRoiQpToolTip
data.value: Enables Focus mode with better quality in the center of the image compared to the sides.

data.name: FpvRefEnhanceToolTip
data.value:
Encoder stream error correction. The value represents number of frames between recovery frames.
If you set 90fps GOP: 1 , real gop is 90 and if you set value to 9 the correction works 10 times a second.

data.name: FpvRefPredToolTip
data.value: If you set TRUE it's softer correction with better image quality, if FALSE stronger correction but it affects the image quality more. TRUE setting is recommended.

data.name: FpvIntraLineToolTip
data.value: FPV intraLine

data.name: FpvIntraQpToolTip
data.value: Experimental, encodes without IDR frames, can't be recorded without special plugin.

data.name: FpvRoiRectToolTip
data.value: FPV roiRect - (Left x Top x H x W )

data.name: UpdateCameraToolTip
data.value: Updates Camera's firmware to selected firmware

data.name: Enable40MhzToolTip
data.value: Uploads the modified wifibroadcast file to enable 40Mhz mode

data.name: UploadLatestVtxMenuToolTip
data.value: Upload the latest vtxmenu for the MSPOSD of OpenIPC To enter the VTX menu move: LEFT stick to bottom right and RIGHT stick to bottom left

data.name: SelectBandwithToolTip
data.value:
Bandwidth:
Select the WiFi bandwidth for communication. Wider bandwidths (e.g., 40MHz) support higher speeds but may increase interference; narrower bandwidths (e.g., 20MHz) improve stability in congested areas.

data.name: SelectMCSIndexToolTip
data.value:
MCS Index (Modulation and Coding Scheme Index):
Specifies the data rate and modulation type for wireless communication. Higher values generally mean faster speeds but require better signal quality.

data.name: SelectStbcToolTip
data.value:
STBC (Space-Time Block Coding):
Improves wireless communication reliability and performance by transmitting duplicate signals across multiple antennas.

data.name: SelectLdpcToolTip
data.value:
LDPC (Low-Density Parity Check):
Enables error correction for reliable data transmission by reducing packet loss in challenging environments.

data.name: SelectFecKToolTip
data.value:
FEC K (Forward Error Correction K):
Defines the number of data blocks to encode for error correction. A larger value increases efficiency but reduces redundancy.

data.name: SelectFecNToolTip
data.value:
FEC N (Forward Error Correction N):
Represents the total number of blocks, including data and parity, used in error correction. A larger value enhances reliability but lowers throughput.

data.name: Select58GHzFrequencyToolTip
data.value:
5.8GHz transmit frequency:
Select the 5.8GHz frequency channel for wireless communication. Higher frequencies may provide faster speeds but reduced range.

data.name: Select58GHzPowerToolTip
data.value:
5.8GHz transmit power:
Adjust the transmission power for the 5.8GHz frequency. Higher power improves range but may increase interference and battery consumption.

data.name: Select24GHzFrequencyToolTip
data.value:
2.4GHz transmit frequency:
Select the 2.4GHz frequency channel for wireless communication. Lower frequencies offer better range and penetration through obstacles.

data.name: Select24GHzPowerToolTip
data.value:
2.4GHz transmit tower:
Adjust the transmission power for the 2.4GHz frequency. Lower power conserves energy but reduces transmission range.

data.name: LocalIpToolTip
data.value: IP of the device running the App

data.name: DroneKeyActionsToolTip
data.value: Send or receive encrypted key to/from connected device

data.name: DeviceChkSumToolTip
data.value: • Green: matches default key (drone.key or gs.key) • Red: does not match default key

data.name: PingStatusToolTip
data.value: Displays state of Ping Result when valid IP is entered • Green : Ping result is valid • Red : Ping result is not valid

data.name: TelemetryRouterToolTip
data.value: 1) Mavfwd 2) Mav-Router 3) MSPOSD
